item.title: Borderless WPF Window
item.description: I’ve put together a very simple borderless WPF window that complements Microsoft’s Metro style quite well. I won’t go into a lot of detail here, since the code does most of the talking, but I will go over the important parts here. If you want to skip right to the source code, you can find it over at GitHub: http://bit.ly/N7afKQ Starting with a fresh window set and the window properties WindowStyle="None", AllowsTransparency="True", and ResizeMode="CanResizeWithGrip".
